posts.summary:
The Thing or The Oh Noeux Tapestry
2017
Embroidery on Canvas
The Thing or The Oh Noeux Tapestry is a fourteen-metre long work of...
posts.body:
The Thing or The Oh Noeux Tapestry
2017
Embroidery on Canvas

The Thing or The Oh Noeux Tapestry is a fourteen-metre long work of endurance embroidery began 1 January 2017 and completed 31 December 2017, documenting the news and the process of consuming it.

reblog.comment:
The Thing or The Oh Noeux Tapestry

Embroidery on Canvas

posts.summary:
Shield
2018
Wax, display case, light
Shield is a meditation on masculinity and power. The tiles are wax casts of the substantial...
posts.body:
Shield
2018
Wax, display case, light

Shield is a meditation on masculinity and power. The tiles are wax casts of the substantial belt buckle once belonging to the artist’s grandfather, who was a Chicago Police Sergeant investigated in the 1970s as part of a ring of police shaking down motorists for payoffs. While eventually granted immunity from prosecution by the state, he was indicted, along with two fellow policemen, for perjury by a grand jury for lying about his involvement.
